subject: Integrate notification permissions into tutorial onboarding
body:
Added notification permission step to tutorial flow to improve UX and prevent conflicts with notification banner:

Changes:
- Added step 8 "Stay in the Loop" to tutorial with notification prompt
- Shows "Enable Now" and "Maybe Later" buttons on notification step
- TutorialModal now accepts requestNotificationPermission prop
- Home screen passes requestPermission function to tutorial
- Updated CLAUDE.md to reflect 9-step tutorial

Benefits:
- Users guided through notification setup during onboarding
- No tutorial/banner conflicts - permission request is part of the flow
- Higher opt-in rates due to contextual prompting
- Users can still skip with "Maybe Later" option
title: Integrate notification permissions into tutorial onboarding
